name: 12 Second Shockdown
description:
A Stylish 12 Second Combofest

Stylishly combo an enemy to gain more time before you run out!

Controls:
  • Movement: Only A and D to move left and right
  • J to jump
  • K to attack
  • See [ Info ] screen for more details!

Game made for the Knockout!! 72 hour Slam Jam. I used the theme: 120 seconds / ⚡ Zing

Source Code Here! https://github.com/jmbarber19/Shockdown

[ Post Jam Update ] - Added WebGL Build (Apparently all the cool kids do this?) - Made open source on my github
